metadata.title: CVE-2018-8763 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Roland Gruber Softwareentwicklung LDAP Account Manager before 6.3 has XSSvia the dn parameter to the templates/3rdParty/pla/htdocs/cmd.php URI orthe template parameter to thetemplates/3rdParty/pla/htdocs/cmd.php?cmd=rename_form URI.

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
